A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The action and cinematic's were beautiful\, dare I say breathtaking. The story was more interesting than TFA and I finally cared about these characters. However\, this new trilogy feels hollow. As if this wasn't how the next big chapter of Star Wars was meant to look like. It rely's on too many callbacks to older episodes. Basically if you're not a hardcore fan\, it's a good movie. If you are a hardcore fan\, it's still a good movie.. but it doesn't feel right. And I just can't get past that feeling.
